RESOURCE.DESCRIPTION: Helio HEC time based query V1.16.25
RESOURCE.INFO: SELECT soho_eit_wave_transient.HEC_id,soho_eit_wave_transient.time_start,soho_eit_wave_transient.previmg_time,soho_eit_wave_transient.img_time,soho_eit_wave_transient.quality,soho_eit_wave_transient.lat_hg,soho_eit_wave_transient.long_hg,soho_eit_wave_transient.v_ps,soho_eit_wave_transient.v_proj,soho_eit_wave_transient.pa,soho_eit_wave_transient.comment FROM soho_eit_wave_transient WHERE time_start>='2003-02-01T00:00:00' AND time_start<='2003-02-10T00:00:00' LIMIT 100 OFFSET 0

FIELD.name: time_start
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Start time of event (same as Image Time)

FIELD.name: quality
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Quality Rating: Q0: Very low reliability; Q1: Low reliability; Q2: Low reliability; Q3: Intermediate reliability; Q4: High reliability; Q5: Nearly definite reliability;

FIELD.name: long_hg
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Heliographic Longitude. (A source longitude of 90 or ???90 indicates that the apparent source of the wave was either at, above, or possibly behind the solar limb.)

FIELD.name: v_ps
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Speed of wave-front on the plane of the sky.

FIELD.name: v_proj
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Speed of wave front assuming the wave travels in a great circle along the Sun's photosphere.

FIELD.name: pa
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Direction of Measurement on the photosphere expressed as a position angle (measured N through E) in relation to the Sun-Earth line..
